H0.text: What group of people drove a 1959 Chevrolet hearse with license plate ECTO-1. Ghost Hunters

H1.text: What group of people drove a 1959 Chevrolet hearse with license plate ECTO-1. Funeral Home Staff

H2.text: What group of people drove a 1959 Chevrolet hearse with license plate ECTO-1. Paranormal Investigators

H3.text: What group of people drove a 1959 Chevrolet hearse with license plate ECTO-1. GB1

A4.text: The Specialised Electronical Vehicular Device (also known as the Ectomobile, Ecto-1) is a fictional vehicle from the Ghostbusters franchise.

A5.text: Dr. Ray Stantz found the vehicle in 1984, shortly after he mortgaged a house left to him by his parents in order to buy and remodel a dilapidated firehouse for use as the team's headquarters.
